name: Gate Down with it
description:
Instead of shooting the enemies, block off their path and make them walk into spikes! Made by a team of 4 (6 in total, 2 left) for the GMTK 2018 Game Jam.

Controls:

WASD - Move camera.

Mouse Wheel - Zoom in and out.

Click - Places gate.

Credits:

All art and code done by team. 

Menu Sound:
